headline: Jim Cramer Thinks FedEx (FDX) Is Running on Robots – But the Market’s Not Watching
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Raises Big Question About Tariffs & Discusses These 11 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where FedEx Corporation (NYSE:FDX) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses.
